message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more profit. How about we compromise at $100?
I'm still a bit away from my target, but I'm willing to meet you at $95. Can you consider that?
I understand you're still looking to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $95. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. How about we meet at $105?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still think $95 is a fair price. Can you meet me at $98?
I'm not willing to go all the way up to $98, Bob. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. How about we meet at $107?
